item.title: Courts 'will not see' humiliated rapist ex-MP again if released, barrister argues
item.description: <p>Crown prosecutor Monika Knowles described Ward&#x27;s conduct as &quot;very disturbing&quot; and said he had provided no explanation about why he acted as he did.</p>

item.title: Search for mystery ticket-holder yet to claim $15 million lotto win
item.description: <p>It has been nearly two full days since the winning numbers were drawn.</p>

item.title: 'So angry': Pauline Hanson calls for return of plastic shopping bags
item.description: <p>The Queensland senator has called for the return of plastic bags. The supermarket isn&#x27;t having it.</p>

item.title: Sculpture by the Sea worker claims he was sacked after raising safety alarm
item.description: <p>A sculpture installer who suffered facial lacerations working for popular art event Sculpture by the Sea claims he was sacked after complaining about safety.</p>

item.title: Sydney sweats through warmest night in months as hot weekend looms
item.description: <p>According to analysis by Weatherzone, the warm winds reached gusts of up to 50km/h.</p>

item.title: The AI giant set to consume as much power as New York City and San Diego combined just got even bigger
item.description: <p>The developers behind ChatGPT agreed to buy 6 gigawatts worth of AMD&#x27;s graphics processing units (GPUs).</p>

item.title: NRL star Brandon Smith waits for police evidence as he fights drug and betting allegations
item.description: <p>Brandon Smith is still waiting to see police evidence as he fights allegations of supplying cocaine to fellow NRL star Victor Radley.</p>

item.title: Former A-League captain admits role in corrupt betting scam
item.description: <p>Ulises Davila, 34, was accused of being the ringleader of the betting scam which saw him and two Macarthur Bulls teammates deliberately earn yellow cards to satisfy a betting outcome.</p>

item.title: Search for two shooters following daylight killing of ex-UFC fighter
item.description: <p>Suman Mokhtarian survived a previous assassination attempt outside a gym last year and had been warned his life was in danger.</p>

item.title: Baby Priya's death at 42 days old lead to a landmark parental leave law
item.description: <p>New legislation aims to stop workplaces cancelling employer-funded paid parental leave if a child is stillborn or dies.</p>

item.title: 'Just a kiss' defence spurned as teacher groomer jailed
item.description: <p>Vasilious Kafataris, 57, was unsuccessful in his bid to avoid being sent back to jail after he argued the six months he spent on remand were punishment enough.</p>

item.title: Do you have what it takes? Experts reveal what Mars astronauts need
item.description: <p>Oï»¿ne crucial factor above all others could determine whether the prospective years-long missions succeed.</p>

item.title: Donald Trump says Israel and Hamas agree to 'first phase' of Gaza peace deal

item.title: Court prohibits pro-Palestine protest at Sydney Opera House
item.description: <p>This morning, the three judges unanimously agreed to block the protest, citing safety concerns for the estimated 40,000-strong crowd.ï»¿</p>

item.title: The device that could detect an asthma attack from home in only five minutes
item.description: <p>Lï»¿ast year, 467 people died from asthma attacks. </p>

item.title: Prosecutors say judge handed down 'inappropriate' sentence to mushroom killer Erin Patterson in appeal filing
item.description: <p>The murderer&#x27;s punishment is &quot;manifestly inadequate&quot;, they say.</p>

item.title: Victoria Premier Jacinta Allan calls on toll road operators to waive fees for summer
item.description: <p>Iï»¿t comes the day after Premier Jacinta Allan revealed free public transport through summer&#x27;s weekends.</p>

item.title: Victorian magistrates still encouraged to release underage offenders on bail 'where possible' despite crime cr
item.description: <p>The guidelines are still instructing judges and magistrates to grant bail for accused youth offenders.</p>

item.title: Ferrari goes electric with new car but promises same driving thrills
item.description: <p>By now it&#x27;s common for almost every traditional car brand to have some sort of offering in the Electric Car market in Australia.</p>

item.title: Eleven-year-old boy driving ute dies in rollover, another seriously injured
item.description: <p>An 11-year-old boy has died after the ute he was allegedly driving rolled off the road this morning.</p>

item.title: Former pilot accused of staging lawnmower crash to stand trial for wife's murder
item.description: <p>A man accused of staging his wife&#x27;s death to look like a ride-on lawnmower crash has been ordered to stand trial for her murder.</p>

item.title: Thief breaks in, steals from Adelaide charity
item.description: <p>An Adelaide charity shop has had about $500 worth of donated goods stolen during a targeted break-in caught on camera.</p>

item.title: Two tickets claim Powerball's $50 million jackpot
item.description: <p>The $25 million prize is believed to be the biggest lottery win the Northern Territory has ever had.</p>
